description: A collection of circles in a formation shaped like a person running, seen in profile (sorry, there's really no other way to describe it!) with a line of circles in a curved S-shaped line to the left of the person-shaped formation and a thin line of circles below. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is an orange triangle in the bottom right area of the person-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
